original_text: Then Jesus and his disciples arrived in Jericho. When they were leaving the city again, a large crowd of people followed them. A blind man was sitting by the side of the road. He was asking people to give him money. His name was Bartimaeus and he was the son of Timaeus.
korean_text: 그들이 여리고에 이르렀더니 예수께서 제자들과 허다한 무리와 함께 여리고에서 나가실 때에 디매오의 아들인 맹인 거지 바디매오가 길 가에 앉았다가

sentences.original_text: Then Jesus and his disciples arrived in Jericho.
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 예수님과 그의 제자들이 여리고에 도착했습니다.

sentences.original_text: When they were leaving the city again,
a large crowd of people followed them.
A blind man was sitting by the side of the road.
He was asking people to give him money.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 사람들에게 돈을 달라고 요청하고 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: and he was the son of Timaeus.
